bike.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, smooth welds, hydroformed top tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube. Rear triangle: A1-SL w/ cold-forged dropout, post disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Manitou Marvel Comp TS air w/ tapered alloy steerer, lockout, 80mm travel (13"-15") 100mm travel (17"-19")
Shimano Deore, M590 w/ integrated spindle, 42/32/24
Shimano SLX, M670 SGS Shadow top normal, 10-speed
Shimano M435 32H Center Lock disc hubs, Vera Terra DPD22 rims
Schwalbe Racing Ralph, 26" x 2.1" folding, 67 tpi
Oval M100, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 640mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M213, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval Womens W200 w/ satin steel rails
Oval M200, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
